name: Kori - A Forest Quest
description:
Kori - A Forest Quest

This is the final version of my first game. 

All the art and animations we´re made with great love and patience and with a great overall wish to be able to give life to this small world.

Venture through the forest avoid and kill enemies, collect gems, find treasures, reach different areas  with a cool and relaxing soundtrack, solve puzzles, collect the energy orbs and use them to fight your way through the levels and clean up the forest from some strange creatures.

If you want you can close the game and when you come back to it you can use the load button to load the last level you played and continue your quest.

Use it wisely there´s only one slot.

This game will be available for Windows, Mac and Linux.

Hope you like this simple but yet nice game and have a great time playing it.
